text:
*CMS Hub Developer Features and Updates*
The launch of CMS Hub includes several important updates for developers. Nothing needs to be done to existing sites to preserve existing functionality. The changes we’re announcing make the HubSpot CMS more powerful for developers and marketers. We’ve compiled the most important highlights and noted where you can learn more about each of these updates.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/cms-hub>
